Mod0_Description: If an enemy is hit by {c_important}Maul{/c}, then {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} of your Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:FORTIFY_CASTER})|0|]){/c}.
Mod1_Description: Increases the range and radius of {c_important}Maul{/c} by {c_number}[SF_3 *100|%|]{/c}.
Mod2_Description: {c_important}Maul{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Knock Down enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_B_KNOCKDOWN}{/c} seconds.
name: Maul
simple_desc: Basic Skill: Turn into a Werebear and tear at an enemy.
